newsitem.title: BELGIUM: SOCCER-SPEHAR HAT-TRICK LAUNCHES CLUB BRUGES' SEASON.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-SPEHAR HAT-TRICK LAUNCHES CLUB BRUGES' SEASON.

text.p: A hat-trick by Croatia international Robert Spehar gave title contenders Club Bruges the best possible start to the Belgian season on Saturday.
Spehar's scoring boosted Club Bruges to a 4-0 win at Ghent.
Defending champions Lierse opened with a 3-0 home success against Lokeren despite losing more than half their team on the European transfer market.
Cup winners Ekeren thumped RWD Molenbeek 3-1 while promoted Westerlo trounced Sint-Truiden 4-1.
